explains: n. 女神；极受崇敬（或敬慕）的女人

sentences.en: The river was personified as a goddess.
sentences.cn: 这条河被人格化，成为一位女神。

sentences.en: Most of the upper castes worship the goddess Kali.
sentences.cn: 大部分的印度上层种姓都信奉卡莉女神。

sentences.en: Raquel Welch was at the height of her popularity as a sex goddess.
sentences.cn: 拉克尔·韦尔奇作为一位性感女神曾红极一时。
